Package com.cigital.insecurepay.common

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AsyncCommonTask
    AsyncCommonTask extends AsyncTask, that returns ResponseWrapper.
    Connectivity
    Connectivity is a class that implements Serializable and is used to handle most connection related properties including cookies.
    CustomDecoder
    CustomDecoder is a class that decodes SSN Number.
    DBHelper
    DBHelper is a class that extends SQLiteOpenHelper.
    GetAsyncCommonTask<T>
    GetAsyncCommonTask extends AsyncCommonTask.
    JsonFileHandler
    JsonFileHandler is a class that is used to handle read and write data to JSON file.
    PostAsyncCommonTask<T>
    PostAsyncCommonTask extends AsyncCommonTask.
    ResponseWrapper
    ResponseWrapper is a wrapper class that stores the response details from the server.
